Name: RetroRange
About the game: RetroRange is a casual retro cyberpunk sandbox first-person shooter with object destructive physics. If you are looking for a Casual shooter experience then look no further than RetroRange. A variety of firearms to choose from and lots of different objects to shoot and pick up and move around. Features: Shooting: Firearms included are Pistol, AK, Auto Shotgun, Sniper Rifle, Pump Shotgun Planned features/Improvements: An Outdoor range for more gameplay Steam leaderboards & Achievements
